entry.title: Shadows of the Future
entry.summary:
Author: orphan_account

Summary: In the depths of Wayne Manor, Damian Wayne faces a challenge unlike any he’s ever encountered—a secret that threatens to unravel everything he knows. At just eighteen, he discovers he's pregnant with Tim Drake's child, and the weight of this revelation sends him spiraling into fear and uncertainty. As he struggles to come to terms with his new reality, Damian must navigate the complexities of family, identity, and the daunting future that lies ahead. Will he find the strength to embrace his unexpected path, or will the shadows of his past consume him?**Warning this is an adapted story by BonnieandClyde i liked the idea or concept of their story just not their writing style*

entry.title: Dynasty
entry.summary:
Author: Write_Me_A_Story

Summary: “'Drake.' It’s like lightning strikes. His back goes rigid as his head whips in the direction of that voice. The voice that has been coming over his phone speaker almost every day for the past four months. He doesn’t know how he didn’t notice the car door closing, but he didn’t, and he’s now confronted with him. The person who has had him more nervous in the past thirty minutes than possibly anything else in his entire life."A version of the life that might have been if Tim and Damian had dropped the act and tried. And maybe failed. But always try again.I'm sorry, I suck at summaries. But, it's good, I promise.
